function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global supply chain disruptions","Impact":"Significant economic impact due to the disruption of goods and services","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, local production, and strategic stockpiling","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, automation in manufacturing","People":"Developing countries, import-dependent economies","Owner":"Governments, businesses, international organizations"},{"Description":"Tourism industry collapse","Impact":"Loss of income, unemployment, and economic decline in tourist-dependent regions","Mitigation":"Promotion of domestic tourism, support for alternative industries, and financial aid","Technologies":"Virtual tourism experiences, online booking and reservation systems","People":"Tourist-dependent communities, hospitality workers","Owner":"Local governments, tourism organizations, hospitality industry"},{"Description":"Falls in remittances by migrants","Impact":"Reduced income for families in developing countries, increased poverty and financial insecurity","Mitigation":"Support for digital remittance services, financial education, and job creation programs","Technologies":"Digital banking platforms, remittance apps, online financial literacy resources","People":"Families in developing countries reliant on remittances","Owner":"Remittance service providers, government agencies, non-profit organizations"}]}
